  • Method Details

    • entails

      public List<Substitution> entails(Atom... goalsArray)
      Given a sequence of atoms representing subgoals, returns a list of bindings that make the query true. If there are no such bindings, returns an empty list. If there is a binding that requires no substitutions, then returns a list containing an empty list.
      Parameters:
      goalsArray -
      Returns:

    • entails

      public List<Substitution> entails(List<Atom> goals)
      Returns a list of bindings that makes the query true, or null if there are no such bindings. If there are no such bindings, returns an empty list. If there is a binding that requires no substitutions, then returns a list containing an empty list.
      Parameters:
      goals -
      Returns:

      Applies a set of bindings to a deque of goals.

    • filterOutGensymVariables

      public static Substitution filterOutGensymVariables(Substitution bindings)
      Creates a new list of bindings with any gensym variables (i.e., those that start with "_g") removed.

    • standardizeApart
